title: Launcher wont open
body: Hey im a mac user of league and I've of course have had my fair share of problems due to being on a mac. My most recent problem is after I finish playing league, I will close it and if I try to re open it without restarting my whole mac, it won't re open. I click the icon and it bounces for a split second and nothing happens. I'm using the new client if anyone has any solutions please lmk. After I restart the launcher opens regularly its only after i close it and try re open is when it doesnt open

replies.body:
Does this only happen when you're using the Beta Client, or does this happen if you play from the *Legacy Client* after launching from the login screen?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
just reinstall the client, and try the old one before witching back to the new one
